body:
IGES is a Vectorworks export option.


I'm not clear what bricad is.


thanks


tom


On 23 Oct 2007, at 16:25, Lars O. Grobe wrote:


> If you can export IGES, you might get even better geometry when  
> using brlcad to convert to e.g. obj than rad.
